seniority_level.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Senior Data Engineer' with no conflicting signals about experience level

job_family.evidence: Title is 'Senior Data Engineer' and core responsibilities focus on data pipelines and infrastructure

sub_specialty.evidence: Mentions 'data pipelines' and tools like 'Airflow' and 'dbt' which are strongly associated with batch ETL

leadership_expectation.evidence: Responsibilities include driving data infrastructure and architecture forward, collaborating closely with analytics team, and liaising with stakeholders, indicating technical leadership without direct reports

primary_cloud.evidence: AWS technology stack explicitly mentioned (Redshift, S3, EC2, Lambda, SageMaker)

secondary_clouds.evidence: GCP mentioned as advantageous in the job posting

processing_paradigm.evidence: Mentions 'data pipelines' (batch) and 'advanced machine learning models' (could imply real-time or hybrid needs), but no explicit streaming tools mentioned beyond potential inference from SageMaker

orchestrator_category.evidence: Airflow explicitly mentioned as a daily tool

storage_layer.evidence: AWS Redshift (warehouse) and S3 (data lake) explicitly mentioned as part of the stack

remote_restriction.evidence: Location stated as 'Stockholm, Stockholm County, Sweden' but no explicit remote work model or restrictions mentioned

timezone_focus.evidence: Company is based in Sweden and serves Nordic countries, suggesting European timezone focus

relocation_required.evidence: No mention of relocation assistance or requirement in job posting or Pass 1 results

h1b_friendly.evidence: No explicit mention of H1B sponsorship in Pass 1 results

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of OPT/CPT or student visa eligibility; job is likely targeting already authorized candidates in Sweden or EU

citizenship_required.evidence: Company states commitment to equality and diversity, welcoming applications from all qualified individuals regardless of ethnicity, religion, age, etc., suggesting no citizenship restrictions

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Employment type stated as 'full_time' in Pass 1 results and benefits like pension and healthcare are mentioned, typical of W2 employment

benefits_level.evidence: Benefits include pension, healthcare, paid vacation, parental pay lift, wellness allowance, and social events (3+ basic benefits with some premium perks like wellness allowance and parental pay lift)

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Mentions 'Learn, grow, be challenged' and 'Ambitious with a will to learn and develop', indicating growth opportunities but no explicit career tracks

mentorship_signals.evidence: Mentions 'help from people' and 'Inclusion and Non-Hierarchy' as company values, suggesting a collaborative environment with potential mentorship from senior team members

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No explicit mention of promotion paths or advancement in the job posting or Pass 1 results

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal mobility, lateral moves, or team changes in job posting or Pass 1 results

career_tracks_available.evidence: Role emphasizes technical leadership and driving data infrastructure forward, suggesting an IC track with potential to grow into Staff/Principal roles based on implied growth opportunities

requirement_strictness.evidence: Pass 1 results show a mix of 'must have' hard skills (SQL, Python, AWS, data governance, security, dbt, Airflow, IaC tools) and 'nice to have' skills (GCP, ecommerce), indicating medium strictness

scope_definition.evidence: Job description focuses on data engineering responsibilities and scalable data pipelines, with no mention of hybrid roles or ambiguous duties

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Requirements align well with 'Senior Data Engineer' role; no unrealistic skill combinations or excessive years of experience for the inferred seniority level
